text:
Gupta bhai,
Tumhari wing ke saath toh alag hi prem tha. Pure IITK me tujhse badhia party koi organise nahi karva sakta laundon ke liye. Kisi launde me itna dum hi nahi hai ki itne laundon ko ikatha karke F3 jaise quality sessions karva sake, sab halke launde hain. Jaate jaate aakhri din bhi bilkul khush kar dia tha bhai tune. Kaash kuch aur parties karne ko mile bhai tere saath.
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Mishra saale,
Kya hi bolun bhai, bas ek baar vo Hall-9 ki thandi hawa vali raat dobara ho jaye toh maza aa jaye xD. Bahut backchodiyan karta hai tu, au sab log teri bahut maarte hain, but tu kabhi bura nahi maanta, kaafi sahi insaan hai bhai tu. Baaki apan donon internally toh ek jaise hi aalsi, kaamchor type log hain, kya hi kar sakte hain lmao. Tu hi ek mere jaisa banda hai cse mein jise aaram ki zindagi chahiye lol. Badhiya insaan hai mishra tu, jald hi last ka mahina recreate karte hain.
Yours Truly,
Jindal
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Sir, shabd hi nahi hain mere paas. 
Bas yahi keh ke chhod deta hun:
Thank you for visiting to my
The 
Carnival 
Universe
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Yo Bro!
I remember that we first met during that ELS-HSS treasure hunt event, and man, what a night that was! I have spent so much of my time with you on campus, and I have really enjoyed those moments. From you coming to my room in the first year to hang out to me coming to your room in the last year with cans of beer, we have seen and done it all. It has been one hell of a journey with you, dude, and it's tough for me to do justice to all those times in this short paragraph. Nevertheless, I really admire your ability to get up, take a bath every day :P and work your ass off. I have always struggled at writing these things, and it's getting really difficult for me now, lol. All the best for your future, mate, and let's hope that we would be able to go for that US road trip soon. Aur haan, baal katwa le xD.
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text: Hey Ayush, it was really great to know and interact with you, although our interactions were limited. All the best for the future, mate. I hope we meet again sometime soon :)
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Sharma bhaii! Goa aur wing vali parties ki toh ab kya hi baat karein xD. Kitna sahi time kaata hai bhai tere saath, mast aadmi hai bhai tu. Tere bed pe kutta aake leta, tune gadda ulta kar diya. Terko computer game khelne ka chaska laga, tu do din tak bed se utha hi nahi. Tujhe bakchodi chadhi, tu rw chhod ke lw me aa gaya lol. Tujhe non-core mein interest kya aaya, tune Ahmedabad nikaal diya. Aise hi chaapte rahio bhai. Yeh sab toh formality ke liye likh rahe hain, sab cheezein words mein describe nahi kar sakte. 
Cheers, to not mixing shakes and drinks! :D
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text: Yo Baldip! Tu lectures mein, campus pe randomly kahin bhi mil jata tha, and mujhe feel aa jati thi ki koi badhia convo hone vali hai xD. Unfortunately, online sem mein yeh sab nahi ho paya. Kaafi sahi insights nikal ke aati thi tere saath baat karke. All the best for the future, man. I really hope to see you soon and have a real-time, in-person chat with you.
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text: Nahi ho payega bhai
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text: Gosai mere bhai. Tu na hota toh cse degree nahi kat paati. Saari cheezein saath mein kari hain apan ne, classes saath chodte the, hall 1 canteen me special chai peete the sagar maggi ke saath, placement test saath dete the, aur na jaane kya kya. Tere saath comfort tha bhai alag hi. Last sem me tujhko saari ulti seedhi cheezein karte dekh ke maza hi aa gaya tha bhai lol. Kuch videos padi hain mere paas un aakhri dinon ki, dheere dheere reveal karta hun lmao. Looking forward to that next party!
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text: Hey Gunjan! I remember that we met at Anish's birthday party in 2nd year. Haan, vo course yaad hai mujhe and yeh bhi ki tune usmein aage baith ke top kia tha xD. Covid bhi hum donon ko same time pe hua tha, mujhe toh lagta hai ki tu aur Bhavesh hi Indore se camous laaye the covid lol. And yeah, that last ride was really painful. Take care and best of luck!
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text: Kushagra bro! Kaafi sahi time kaata tere saath yaar, especially last month mein. You were that guy jiske saath kisi bhi cheez pe ek badhiya aur genuine discussion ho jata tha. It was always nice meeting you man, and I have always been impressed by your ability to put yourself completely into anything, whether it’s work related or party related. Vo tempo se phone slip hone vala incident toh unreal tha yaar, tune yaad dila diya XD. Last month mein tere saath jo parties kari voh bahut yaad aati hain yaar, especially vo raat jab Hall-9 ki chat pe kaafi sahi hawa chal rahi thi, sonthalia so raha tha, aur hum uske room mein kuch khaane ka dhund rahe the lmao. All the best for your future mate, and haan US mein F3 toh recreate hoga hi, coast decide karle bas.
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text: Osamo, apni career trajectory toh kaafi same hi thi college mein. Maine soc aur surge bas isliye kiya tha kyuki mujhe pata tha ki osama hustler kar raha hai toh kuch soch samajh ke hi kar raha hoga. Tu hi badhia launda tha Goa ki trip pe jo ek itinerary ke saath taiyaar tha, jise pata tha kahan jaana hai. Although tune goa me washroom me kuch toh gadbad zarur kari thi saale. Aakhri ke kuch din bhi badhia kate apne campus mein, aur us subah tune hall 9 me aake toh dil hi jeet liya tha <3.
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Naxhy Bhai <3,
Mast aadmi hai bhai tu. First year se leke last year itni backchodiyan ki hain tere saath ab yaad bhi nahi aa rahi hain xD. Second year se toh alag hi gala tarr karne lag gaya tha tu lol. IITK ki alag alag canteens mein tere saath itna bulla kaata hai bhai. Apni Goa vali trip toh ek dum bindaas thi, par fir uske baad corona bhi apne ko saath mein hi ho gaya tha. 4 saal mein tere itne naam nikale bhai badhiya badhiya - naxhy, mandu, nanguboi, aur haan such-a-chutiya lmao. Aakhri ke kuch dinon mein jab Hall-2 (humari maa) se saaman lene gaye toh tere room se 1 nahi balki 2 time capsule banane ka jugaad ho gaya tha, jald hi khodne chalenge usko toh. Jald se jald milte hain bhai.
Yours Truly,
Kevin
Ps- Agli baar milte hi honey-chilli meri taraf se!
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text: Aur bhai, I remember that you were the only guy who used that stupid Tauaa table in the first year. Tu first year me aadhe se jyada time to mere room pe hi baitha rehta tha, aur fir toh tu roommate hi ban gaya.  We went together for the "college mountains trip", jisme itna zyada chal ke ek sukha hua jharna hi dekh paaye the, and the "college beach trip", jisme raat ke 2 baje room ka lock tudwana pada tha lmao. Aur bhai 12 baje se pehle kaun sota hai college mein, aur vo bhi swimming karte hue lol?. One thing that I really liked about you is that you always had some good Gujarati snacks in your cupboard xD. I hope that I will get to meet you soon. Pandemic kaafi bt de chuka hai bhai, ab ek badhia trip banti hai!
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text: Hey Prateek! Kaafi saare courses mein apan ne kaafi colab kiya, discussion kiya. Kaafi chilled out aur relaxed banda laga bro tu. Double dassa toh tune mara tha bro, mera toh nahi tha xD. CGS aur PML mein toh kaafi interaction hua apna, aur PML mein toh kaam bhi bahut karna pada lol. CGS mein tu tha toh kaafi sahi laga tha, nahi toh aisa lag raha tha ki galat jagah fass gaya hun :P. Haan yaar apna interaction mostly acads pe focused raha because of the stupid o’rorna. Hopefully hum jald hi dobara mil payein, aur kuch badhiya in-person backchodiyan kar paayein bro. Btw, congrats for Google dude, kaafi ganda chaapa. For sure, let’s stay in touch and plan to meet sometime soon. Till then, all the best, man! :)
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Ram bhai, kya mast banda tha bhai tu. Kaafi saare courses saath mein kate bhai apne, aur kaafi maza aaya bhai tere saath kaam karke. Aakhri ka ek mahina toh bhai lajawab tha apna bilkul. Hall 9 mein biryani se leke hall 12 F3 party tak saari kasar puri kar le apan logon ne corona ke dinon ki. Tujhe dekh ke dil khush ho jata bhai hamesha. Umeed hai jald hi ek aur biryani party karne ko milegi tere saath!
All the best bhai future ke liye.
-Jindal
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Ritesh bhai!
Kitna sahi time kaata bhai apan ne 2nd year mein. Itne courses me saath the apan log, aur tere saath saare course bilkul aaram se kat gaye (os chhod ke, usme toh rona aa gaya tha lol). Tu bhai CP mein toh ganda chaapta hi hai, aur tune placement mein kaafi sahi cheezein batayi bhai, jinse bahut help mili thi. Bhai hall 2 mein jab bhi tu milta tha toh badhia baat ho jati thi apni. Pandemic mein bhi apni badhia baat hoti rahi bhai, aur I hope tujhse aage bhi kisi bahane baat hoti rahe. Tu bahut sajjan aadmi hai bhai, tu probably campus ka sabse humble insaan hai bhai jise mai jaanta hun, aise hi rehna. Milte hain bhai mauka milte hi :)
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Sandeep bro! You were the only guy in the wing jiske saath professional interests align hote the. Meri career trajectory decide karvane mein tera kaafi contribution raha hai. 2nd year summer was one of the best time of my college life and vo tere saath hi kaata tha. Roz swimming jaate the, mangoes khaate the, code chalake chodte the raat ko hyperparameter tuning ke liye, jo kabhi nahi ho paayi dhang se xD. That Hyderabad trip was also really fun; biryani khane gaye the itni mushkil se and they used to make really good shakes jo har roz apan log peete the. Kaafi sahi, soch samajh ke, analysis karke advice deta hai yaar tu, and tere saath discussions ne kaafi help kari hai meri. Bhai tu kisi bhi cheez ki theory ko itne aasani se kaise samajh leta hai, mujhse nahi ho pata bilkul bhi. Thanks bhai mera PML nikalvane ke liye, tere bina nahi ho pati assignments aur project mujhse lol. Ab toh tu Korea ja raha hai, Kpop, Kdrama dekhne shuru kar dega bhai, hum logon ko bhi yaad rakhna, bhul na jaana :D. All the best for your future mate, I know ki tu ganda toh chaapega hi har cheez mein, koi bolne vali baat hi nahi hai lol. I just hope ki apan dobara jaldi milein aur kahin badhiya pool mein relax karein, just to relive those 2nd year memories.
Cheers, 
Jindal
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Aur bulle!
Kaafi sahi bio likha hai tune xD. Kabhi bhi kamre me aa jata tha tu, aur lamba bulla kaat ke jaata tha. Bahut sahi maze aate the bulle mein. Mujhe yaad hai terko khana khane ki jaldi rehti thi, aur tu haath se ishara karke dinner karne ke liye puchta tha lol. 
Bhai itna time beetaya hai tere saath campus pe, saare kisse bhi yaad nahi aa pa rahe. Bhai bahut mann hai milne ka tujhse, I hope jald hi koi badhia trip pe mil sakein apan.
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Cultured Global Citizen Somesh Bajpai! Tu hi ek banda hai bro jiske saath inner aspirations match kar jaati hain. Jab bhi jyada low ya high feel ho raha ho toh mai sochta hun ki Somesh ke saath vibe check kar leta hun. Tu Kanpur ko Naples bana deta hai bhai. Kaafi sahi synergies match hoti hain bhai apni, aur baaki log apne life ki theory vale discussions samajhne ki capacity hi nahi rakhte. Haan LA mein toh mil hi lenge, but apne Monaco GP dekhne jaane ka toh done scene hai, logistics ke issue toh kuch hote hi nahi hain. Bhai nahi likh pa raha yaar aur, words hi bane nahi hain yeh sab describe karne ke liye. 
Haan, yaad rakhio vo bottle khodne jana hai 10 saal baad :D
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Utkarsh Bhaiya!
Ek hi jane ko bhaiya vala darza diya iitk mein, aur vo aapko diya bhaiya. Goa mein kya badhiya maze kiye apan logon ne, vo toh bas aapko thodi capacity kam hone ki vajah se jaldi sona pad gaya tha xD. Goa happening jagah toh hai, koi anjaan aadmi nakli cheez de jata hai, koi thug leta hai, kamre ka lock tudwana pad jata hai, parasailing vale ke saath ladai ho jati hai, ya fir GoD se bhagna pad jaata hai. Bas aisi hi memories banvate rehna bhaiya! 
Cheers,
Yo’boy
Kevin Malone
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Tandonn bhaii!
Tumhare aerobics ke move dekhke hi decide kar liya tha ki tumhare saath hi startup kholna hai. Kaafi sahi stint tha apna startup vala bhi, vo toh bas yashas jeet jaye isliye apan ne chhod diya tha voh competetion. All the best bhai, quant firm toh tumhare saath hi kholni hai.
Cheers,
Punjabi Bagh
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text: Vineet bro, kya badhia vibes aati thi tujhse bhai. Wing me aake tu mast bulla kaat ta tha. Aur Goa me toh bhai maza hi aa gaya tha xD. Anjuna vali raat toh magical thi bhai, alag hi backchodiyan kar di thi uss din. Parasailing ke baare me na hi bola jaye toh sahi hai lol. Rishte ke liye mubaarak baad bhai, pehla launda hai tu group ka. Jaldi hi milte hain, hopefully ek aur trip pe.
author: Vaibhav  Jindal

text:
Bajpai,
Bhai kitni assignments nikalvai hai tune koi ginti nahi hai mere paas lol. Mujhe yaad hai ki tujhse mai chem ya phi lab mein mila tha, aur samajh gaya tha ki tu badhia vibe vala banda hai. Tu bhi meri tarah aalsi hi hai, ESC201 ki lab mein hamesha late aate tha saale xD. Beech mein bhi apni jab bhi baat hui toh kaafi sahi laga yaar tujhse baat karke. Par bhai aakhri ka 1 month toh kaafi sahi tha. Tere saath uss din compilers ka assignment likha tha bahut buri haalat mein lol, aur usme full marks aaye the apne :D. Compilers aur networks karte karte toh pata chal hi gaya tha ki tu mere jaisa hi insaan hai bilkul lol. Hall12 mein tere room pe bhi badhia time kata bhai, aur vo badminton vaali subah kaafi pyaari thi. Kaafi hardworking insaan hai yaar tu, and I hope ki aage tujhse mulakaat hoti rahe. Congrats for MSR, aise hi girte padte chaapte rehna. All the best, mate!
-Jindal
author: Vaibhav  Jindal
